analysis.description:

	- ERC23.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dc5b8ccbe7a3669ed59dcd3b3d5afa0fed4ee57.sol#19-20)
empty in ERC23Token.transfer (/unique_chucks/39/0x1dc5b8ccbe7a3669ed59dcd3b3d5afa0fed4ee57.sol#90-92) is a local variable never initialiazed
